name: AlgoSkin
description: Algorithmic arbitrage trading system built with Node.js and TypeScript, featuring real-time API integration, data scraping, and complex price calculations for profitable trading operations
challenges: Implementing real-time algorithmic price calculations for arbitrage opportunities
Ensuring high system uptime with extensive error handling
Managing secure operations in Linux environment with VPN tunnels
Integrating multiple external APIs for data collection and trading
achievements: Built and deployed profitable trading system with consistent returns
Achieved 99%+ uptime through robust error handling
Successfully integrated multiple external trading APIs
Implemented secure infrastructure with virtualization and VPN
myContributions: Designed and implemented the entire algorithmic trading architecture
Built real-time data scraping and processing systems
Developed complex price calculation algorithms for arbitrage detection
Set up and maintained secure Linux-based production environment

name: ConsultantResume
description: React-based PDF generator for dynamically creating and formatting consultant resumes with strict design requirements, integrated with HR systems using Entra ID authentication
challenges: Implementing dynamic PDF generation with strict formatting requirements
Integrating with existing HR system using Entra ID authentication
Managing database operations and migrations in production environment
Collaborating with designer on pixel-perfect PDF formatting
achievements: Successfully delivered PDF generator meeting all design specifications
Implemented secure authentication integration with existing HR system
Built efficient UI with caching for improved user experience
Deployed using CI/CD pipelines with Docker containers
myContributions: Developed React frontend with PDF generation capabilities
Built new .NET backend API endpoints for data management
Implemented MSAL authentication integration with Entra ID
Set up automated testing and deployment pipelines

name: LMS
description: Comprehensive Learning Management System developed as a school group project, featuring user authentication, course management, and interactive learning modules
challenges: Implementing comprehensive user role management system
Building interactive learning modules with progress tracking
Ensuring scalable database design for course and user data
Coordinating development work across team members
achievements: Delivered fully functional LMS with all required features
Implemented secure authentication and authorization system
Built responsive UI supporting multiple user roles
Achieved 90%+ test coverage using TDD methodology
myContributions: Led backend development with .NET and Entity Framework
Implemented user authentication and role-based access control
Designed and developed course management API endpoints
Set up testing framework and wrote comprehensive unit tests

name: GroceryOptimizer
description: Optimization system for grocery shopping developed as a school group project, featuring algorithm-based route planning and budget optimization for efficient shopping
challenges: Balancing multiple optimization criteria (cost, time, distance)
Processing and organizing large datasets of store and product information
Creating intuitive user interface for complex optimization results
achievements: Developed working optimization algorithm reducing shopping time by 30%
Built user-friendly interface for inputting preferences and viewing results
Achieved optimal performance with large datasets
myContributions: Designed and implemented core optimization algorithms
Developed backend API for processing optimization requests
Created data structures for efficient store and product management
